root: ^Uh... have you found those lights you were looking for?
^Um... not really. I kinda got sidetracked looking at other decorations...
^Y'know... just trying to make my dorm look nice for the season...

^Okay yeah I'm not okay at all I'm very stressed out I have homework to do I have midterms coming up I have to get a job sometime I have to get decorations for my dorm oh my god there's so much I have to do AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHH
^I've been there a few years ago. All that stuff sucks, but you'll get through it.
^Hey, in the meantime, I found something you might like.
^I don't usually dress up, but... maybe I should try it this year. Might help get my mind off things.
